Package com.lgc.wsh.util

Interface Summary
IndexGrouper.Grouper Implement this IndexGrouper.Grouper interface to identify whether adjacent indices are in the same group or not.
Monitor Implement this interface to receive notifications of progress
 

Class Summary
Almost This class allows safe comparisons of floating point numbers with limited precision.
ArrayUtil Static utilities for this package.
ArrayUtil.Line3 Specify a line in 3D with a point and a direction.
ArrayUtil.Plane3 Specifies a plane in 3D
ArrayUtil.Rotate3 Remember and apply rotation around an arbitrary axis.
CleanFormatter Format log messages without any extras.
CleanHandler An alternative to ConsoleHandler.
IndexGrouper Arrange a sorted set of indices into groups of like elements.
IndexSorter Get indices that order an array of values.
Localize Filter a string with specified ResourceBundles.
LoggerStream Wrap a Logger as a PrintStream.
LogMonitor Report progress to default Logger
PartialMonitor Wrap an existing Monitor with a partial range.
StringUtil Utilities for manipulating strings.
StringUtil.TableBuilder A helper class for creating a nicely formatted table to print as a string.
 

Exception Summary
ArrayUtil.IllPosedException Thrown by bad intersections and projections of geometric objects.
